Ok, I have a new challenge for the map makers.  This involves just
making a=
 map, not putting anything on it except for start positions
and an exit.

H=
ere's the challenge(s):

1)Design a map optimized to give elves a significa=
nt advantage in
battle but will allow other characters to navigate and win
=
2)Design a map optimized for clerics to win
3)Design a map optimized to hel=
p archers out, but it can't be pure
wide-open spaces
4)Design a map that wi=
ll give skeletons and ghosts a significant advantage

If you have already c=
reated scenario(s) to meet the challenge(s), just
let us know.
